text.section: A reinsurance intermediary shall be subject to examination by the commissioner. The commissioner shall have access to all books, bank accounts, and records of the reinsurance intermediary in a form usable to the commissioner.
A reinsurance intermediary manager may be examined as if it were the reinsurer.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1088, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 9, effective July 14, 1992.
